description: Starbucks Workers United said it had voted to authorize a strike ahead of the year’s last scheduled bargaining session. title: Starbucks union votes to authorize strike ahead of bargaining

description: Less than half of Americans said their opinion of President-elect Trump is favorable, according to a recent poll. description: President Biden on Tuesday said that there is no sense of danger so far from the drones that have been spotted in the Northeast, noting that officials are looking into them. “Nothing nefarious apparently, but they’re checking it all out,” Biden told reporters about the drones.
